data.text: @AdamNeira @mllesookim @LindaMottram @NellWhitehead @abcnews @Flintdux @bluehousekorea @SecPompeo @USForcesKorea @TurnbullMalcolm If it’s do-able, we must have been successfully unified a decade(s) ago. Any NK experts who knows history & KJU’s Father, they must know this peace “ happenings” is the same old fairy tale NK’s been playing with last 70 years . For NK experts who doesn’t know about it, seriously

@AdamNeira @mllesookim @LindaMottram @NellWhitehead @abcnews @Flintdux @bluehousekorea @SecPompeo @USForcesKorea @TurnbullMalcolm I should disagree. Soo is the most sharpest analyst who’s looking the situation correctly. In the name of peace, world peace,,,, what do you expect in 2050? Unification of Korean Peninsula is not the purpose. We , S Korean doesn’t want to be a devil’s advocate! Not any chance.
@mllesookim @LindaMottram @NellWhitehead @abcnews @Flintdux Agree with u totally.  Signing a peace treaty before completing the denuke process is a disastrous move

@mllesookim @LindaMottram @NellWhitehead @abcnews @Flintdux Soo Kim in this interview is not analysing the Peninsula situation correctly. The difference in threat level, trust-building and reciprocity between 🇰🇵 #NorthKorea, 🇰🇷 🇺🇸 now is a huge improvement since 15/2/2017.
